mapper.select: select a.drug_class_id id, a.drug_class_name name from drug_class a, drug_class_category_rel b where a.drug_class_id = b.drug_class_id and b.drug_category_id = #{ID} and a.direction_count>0 order by a.drug_class_name
select category_id , class_code id, class_nme name, spuer_code, ref_class_code, is_leaf, leaf_count from category where spuer_code = #{ID} and ref_class_code = 101

select ddm.* from drug_direction_master ddm left join hospital_direction_rel hdr on (ddm.direction_no = hdr.direction_id
) where 1 = 1
and ddm.direction_no in (select distinct ddr.direction_no from drug_direction_rel ddr where ddr.drug_Class_id = #{pd.id} )
and ddm.drug_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.name}),'%')
order by case when hdr.direction_id is null then 2 else 1 end, ddm.firm_name ASC

select a.DIRECT_SERIAL_NO,a.DIRECTION_NO,a.TITLE_NO,a.TITLE_INDEX,a.TCONTENT, b.title_name from drug_direction a ,drug_reg_title_dict b where b.title_num = a.title_no and a.direction_no = #{direction_no}
select DIRECT_IMAGE_SERIAL,IMAGE from drug_direction_image where direct_no = #{DIRECTION_NO} and #{ITEM_NAME} like ITEM_NAME
select INDIVI_ID id,DRUG_CLASS_NAME name from individual_dict where drug_class_name is not null order by indivi_id
select a.* from individual_item a where Indivi_id = #{ID}
select a.* from collect_desc_dict a where Indivi_id = #{ID}
select a.* from consistency_range a where Indivi_id = #{ID}

select drd.drug_relref_no, drd.ref_class_code, drd.i_text_id, drd.docu_no, drd.docu_sub_no, drd.title_name, drd.file_name, drd.docu_content, drd.content from drug_relref_direction drd, drug_class_refinfo_rel dcrr where drd.ref_class_code = #{CODE} and drd.i_text_id = dcrr.drug_ref_info_id and drd.docu_sub_no = 0 and dcrr.drug_class_id = #{ID}

select cpi.clinical_pathway_id, cpi.class_code, cpi.dept_name, cpi.keywords, cpi.title_name, cpi.ref_info, cpi.hospital_type, cpi.particular_year, cpi.content from CLINICAL_PATHWAY_INFO cpi where cpi.class_code = #{ID}
